channel.title: Help on Summoning/NPCAttacks!
channel.description: I'm using PimpScape source and whenever someone summons a monster people cant attack it but, when the owner of the summoned monster click attack player, the monster can attack the player but the player cant attack the monster, is there anyway to fix that?

item.title: Help on Summoning/NPCAttacks!
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

Don’t bump, please.

I have an idea: Search through the summoned NPC’s code for the help-summoner code. Now, put an if before the attack code, and make it like if(attacked player is in wildy true) or if you want to completely remove summoned npc’s help for ppl, then just delete the attack code.

Sorry, i can’t help more than this, as i’m using TestScape and not Project16. I hope you can solve this problem good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Help on Summoning/NPCAttacks!
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

DON’T BUMP

(I’m pretty sure it’s supposed to be like that. Monster can only be killed by the summoner)

Read full topic
